scripts.dev: nodemon -e js,ejs,html -w . -w public -w views -w routes -w models app.js --debug
scripts.db:dev:refresh: npx knex migrate:rollback --env development --knexfile ./databases/knexfile.js && npx knex migrate:latest --env development --knexfile ./databases/knexfile.js
scripts.db:stg:refresh: npx knex migrate:rollback --env staging --knexfile ./databases/knexfile.js && npx knex migrate:latest --env staging --knexfile ./databases/knexfile.js
scripts.db:prod:refresh: npx knex migrate:rollback --env production --knexfile ./databases/knexfile.js && npx knex migrate:latest --env production --knexfile ./databases/knexfile.js
